content.rendered:
The following resources are available from the University. Resources marked as confidential are not required to report incidents of sexual misconduct to the Title IX Coordinator.

Counseling and Psychological Services – CONFIDENTIAL RESOURCE

  • 2215 E Street, La Verne (Corner of 2nd Street and E, North/West Corner)
  • Office Hours: 9:00am-5:00pm
  • Phone number: (909) 448-4105
  • After Hours Emergency Crisis phone number: (909) 448-4650
 Office of Religious and Spiritual Life – CONFIDENTIAL RESOURCE

  • Rev. Zandra Wagoner – University Chaplain
  • zwagoner@laverne.edu
  • Phone Number: (909) 448-4446

 

 
Student Health Center – CONFIDENTIAL RESOURCE

  • 2147 E Street, La Verne (Corner of 2nd Street and E, South/West Corner)
  • Office Hours: 8:00am-4:00pm
  • Phone Number: (909) 448-4619
  • Emergency/Non-Emergency after hours, please contact Pomona Valley Hospital Medical Center
 Campus Safety

  • Hours: 24 hours / 7 days a week
  • Phone Number: (909) 448-4950
  • Location: Parking Structure
